column5: NO RENTALS TO COLLEGE STUDENTS. Minimum rental age is 25 years of age.   Our Saida 1 condo (#501) is oceanfront, has three pools (one heated), hot tubs, tennis courts, FREE WIFI, & a fully stocked kitchen. A/C, w/ 3 cable TVs, DVD, & laundry in unit. Gated, family-friendly complex w/ 24/7 security. Best view of the beach on the island. Condo balcony has a warm southern exposure and a great view from the balcony and large windows. Walking distance to several restaurants and stores.
